Managing Forests Saruviya:
As soon as we were in the material world, Fierce monsters attacked our village - Benon. Queen Sereni and Callie Sereban desperately fought with them, not retreat a single step. And along with them - Tazif...
Terrible battle was in full swing. Many soldiers lost their lives and connected to Sihem.
Such was the price of victory. We must not forget Artey soldiers who sacrificed themselves in the name of Benon.
